elements.text: You're organizing your closet when you struggle to remember where you placed your favorite sweater. You remember that you have been misplacing a lot of items, causing you to wonder if your symptoms are progressing. However, you realize that many people misplace items, and it's better to stay...

elements.name: Organizing Closet_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
